title: Shankaracharya Performs Aarti at Dwarkadhish Temple
description: The Shankaracharya of Dwaraka performing the evening Aarti at the main Dwarkadhish temple during Janmashtami celebrations.

title: View of the Gomti Ghat at Sunset
description: A serene evening view of the Gomti Ghat, a sacred bathing spot for pilgrims visiting Dwaraka.

title: Devotees During Janmashtami Celebrations
description: A large gathering of devotees celebrating the birth of Lord Krishna with fervor and devotion.
